subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Shane Warne, 42, is about to play his last game of top-level cricket, drawing to a close a hugely successful career that was blighted by drug use and gambling-driven corruption.
snippet: Shane Warne, 42, is about to play his last game of top-level cricket, drawing to a close a hugely successful career that was blighted by drug use and gambling-driven corruption.
